name: Genshin Impact Dottore Visual Novel: Lost
name_original: Genshin Impact Dottore Visual Novel: Lost
description:
A visual novel about Il Dottore from Genshin Impact. Made this for Dottoween. I did rush it a bit, but hope you can somewhat enjoy it. 

  • You can unlock 3 special pictures/avatars/art in the game. Those are usually part of the endings in the game.
  • 2 more endings with any special visuals.
  • 5 endings in total.

Well, I don't know what else to add :D

Hope you had fun and stuff. Write feedback, questions, bugs, etc. I wanna read the stuff you thought about this <333
